pullRequest.title: Admin create client
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of changes
What did you change in this pull request?  Provide a description of files changed, user interactions changed, etc.  Include how to test your changes.
Related issue
Link to the GitHub issue this pull request addresses using the #issuenum format.  If it completes an issue, use Fixes #issuenum to automatically close the issue.
Checklist
Things for the developer to confirm they've done before the PR should be accepted:

 CHANGELOG.md (and UPGRADING.md if necessary) updated with information for new change.
 Tests added (or description of how to test) for any new features.
 User documentation updated for UI or technical changes.

commit.message: :construction: fields hooked up, reset on close modal
🚧 Working on help popovers and documentation
:construction: Added help popovers for difficult areas of the form
:memo: Updated image for creating a client.
🚧 Reverted files that should not have been modified.

nodes.bodyText: I think this should be catching a different type of exception. I think a NoSuchClientException would be more appropriate as that is what us actually thrown in the IridaClientDetailsServiceImpl.java > loadClientByClientId method. This method signature will also need to be updated to include throws NoSuchClientException. What do you think?
